# grantory_host (Resource)
Manage the lifecycle of the `grantory_host` resource.

## Example
```terraform
resource "grantory_host" "app" {
  host_id = "app01"
  labels = {
    env = "prod"
  }
}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `labels` (Map of String) Optional labels that accompany the host registration.

### Read-Only

- `host_id` (String) Server-generated identifier for the host.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
